name: Electric Eel Style
text: You have learned how to harness electrical energy to momentarily disorient your foes.
prerequisites: Wis 13, Elemental Fist, Improved Unarmed Strike, base attack bonus +9 or monk level 5th.
benefit: You gain one additional Elemental Fist (Advanced Player’s Guide 158) attempt per day. While you are in this style, your Elemental Fist attack deals electricity damage. When a creature takes electricity damage from your Elemental Fist attack, you gain a +4 bonus for 1 round on combat maneuver checks to grapple the creature.
text_zh: 你能利用电能来使敌人迷失方向。
prerequisites_zh: 感知13，元素之拳，精通徒手打击，BAB+9或武僧5级。
benefit_zh: 你每天获得一次额外的元素之拳次数。当你使用本流派时，你的元素之拳会造成闪电伤害。当一个生物受到你的元素之拳闪电伤害时，这一轮中你对其的擒抱战技检定获得+4加值。
